description: On Saturday 9th September, from 12 noon to 5pm, Arbeit will be opening Trowbridge Gardens to the public, with access to gardens and creative workspaces, and a free to attend exhibition and workshops.

factsheet.heading: Exhibition Opening
paragraphs: We will be hosting an exhibition opening for the upcoming exhibition entitled, ‘What makes you feel at Home?’ An exhibition designed for Open House showcasing how local people feel most at home.

factsheet.heading: Wild Clay Workshop
paragraphs: There will be a Wild Clay Workshop where participants can learn how to create pieces using hand building techniques.

factsheet.heading: Open Spaces
paragraphs: Visitors will have access to gardens managed by Hackney Herbal and creative studios that would not usually be accessible to the public, open 12 to 5pm on Saturday 9th September. Come meet creatives in their spaces and learn about their practice.

images.title: South Garden leading to the cafe, Trowbridge Gardens
South Garden seating area, Trowbridge Gardens

name: Arbeit - Trowbridge Gardens
